body_html: Would it work with DataParallel? There's no guarantee about the order in which RNN parameters will appear in parameter list here https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/parallel/replicate.py#L10, and then they might fall into different coalesced buffers, depending on the full network architecture?
